reviewText: I am very happy with this order.
DVD arrived in fine condition n plays fine.
Good movie...on time delivery and nice addition to my collection
Burt's the guy-i'm love'n this movie to pieces-thanks amazon
I am a Burt Reynolds fan to the max. He makes it & I like it.
Fast deliverly. Dvd is great. Burt Reynolds always great to watch. Thankyou Much!  J.Renkert

I love Burt Reynolds.  The movie was very good.  The background music drowned out the voices.  I am hearing impaired and depend on close capitioned.  Which this movie was not.  Even turning up the volume just made the music louder.  I am not giving the movie itself one star but the quality of it.
this is a great movie it is better part of the series i like the hard hitting action of the film
I enjoyed the movie because it is not easy to guess what will happen next.
